comment: Looks a bit nicer in the play store than it does on the watch. Not sharp at all. A little cartoonish!

author: JJIP
comment: When i searched for watch faces for my phone this came up. Great design, but i can find no way to get it to work on my watch. Will change the review if they reply to this with actual instructions.
title: Doesnt work for samsung gear s3 frontier
